enhanced_by.reason: The addClass method is used to add a class to an element, which is a prerequisite for the hasClass method to return true.
The removeClass method is used to remove a class from an element, which is a prerequisite for the hasClass method to return false.
The hasClass method itself can be used to assert the presence of a class after invoking the method.
The removeClass method can be used to assert that a class is removed after invoking the hasClass method.
